tool_description: Validates the authenticity and canonical status of religious texts and passages within their traditions.

text_reference.description: Reference to the text or passage to validate

error_messages: Invalid text reference: Provide a specific text or passage reference.
Unknown tradition: Specify a recognized religious tradition.
Reference not found: The specified text reference is not found in the tradition's corpus.
usage: Provide text_reference and tradition. Returns validation information about the text's canonical status and authenticity within the specified religious tradition.

canonical_status.description: Canonical authority level of the text

authenticity_notes.description: Notes about textual authenticity and scholarly consensus

tradition_acceptance.description: Level of acceptance within the religious tradition
